info.author: Philipp Brimmers
info.description:
PyroMP provides a seamless transition from object oriented
to service oriented programming.
It is based on Pyro4 and multiprocessing.
The former is used for object oriented RPCs and the latter
for process generation.

PyroMP is distributed under the MIT open-source license.

Requirements:

- Python 2.7 or higher
- Pyro4 4.20 or higher

Testing:

- testfixtures

info.name: PyroMP
info.summary: Easy multiprocessing combining Pyro4 and the built-in multiprocessing module
info.html_description:
PyroMP provides a seamless transition from object oriented to service oriented programming. It is based on Pyro4 and multiprocessing. The former is used for object oriented RPCs and the latter for process generation.

PyroMP is distributed under the MIT open-source license.

Requirements:

  • Python 2.7 or higher
  • Pyro4 4.20 or higher

Testing:

  • testfixtures
